    streamFind for mass spectrometry with R

Settings_filter_features_streamFind

Source: R/fct_ms_005_default_ProcessingSettings.R
Settings_filter_features_streamFind.Rd

Settings for filtering of features and feature groups.

Usage

Settings_filter_features_streamFind(
  minIntensity = NULL,
  minSnRatio = NULL,
  maxGroupSd = NULL,
  blank = NULL,
  minGroupAbundance = NULL,
  excludeIsotopes = NULL,
  rtFilter = NULL,
  massFilter = NULL
)

# S3 method for Settings_filter_features_streamFind
validate(x)

Arguments

minIntensity

Numeric (length 1) with the minimum intensity.

minSnRatio

Numeric (length 1) with the minimum signal-to-noise ratio. The filter is only applied if the features data.table contains the column "sn".

maxGroupSd

Numeric (length 1) with the maximum intensity deviation within each analysis replicate (in percentage).

blank

Numeric (length 1) with the intensity threshold for blank subtraction. All features/feature groups not higher then the blank * its intensity are filtered.

minGroupAbundance

Numeric (length 1) with the minimum presence of a feature is a given analysis replicate.

excludeIsotopes

Logical (length 1) with TRUE for filtering annotated isotopes (only prevails the monoisotopic features).

rtFilter

Numeric (length 2) with the min and max retention time (in seconds) values to filter features. Features within the retention time range are filtered out.

massFilter

Numeric (length 2) with the min and max mass (in Da) values to filter features. Features within the mass range are filtered out.

x

A Settings_filter_features_streamFind S3 class object.

Value

A ProcessingSettings S3 class object with subclass Settings_filter_features_streamFind.

Methods (by generic)

  • validate(Settings_filter_features_streamFind): Validates the Settings_filter_features_streamFind S3 class object, returning a logical value of length one.
